The shuttle rocked under the stress of the time rift. The bots inside 
all held on for their lives, that is, all but one bot... 
 
Grimlock slung his large sword over one shoulder, "Me GrimLock tired 
of whiney bots, Me Grimlock want FIGHT!" 
 
Mirage held onto his seat grumbling... "Why'd we get picked for this 
mission?" 

"what's our mission, sir?"said a shadow. 

Mirage held on for dear life... "Were supposed to guard the arc, 
Optimus decided its important enough for us to go and make sure none 
of the deceptifreaks ever bother us before were awoken, I mean with 
Megatron launching the golden disk and all." 
 
Grimlock cracked his knuckles ready to fight. 
   
"I see, sir"said respectfully the male"Wait... Are you one of the 
legendary Autobots that were in the great war?" 
 
Grimlock Grunted nodding pointing to the Autobot symbol on his chest, 
while Mirage smiled feeling smug, then wondered if they younger bot 
meant grimlock... 
 
Sudeenly they past the exit and earth was in full view. 
 
Grimlock crossed his arms and nodded thinking of the heads he'd bash. 
 
UnknowBot: 
 
"I see... "replied thoughtfully the male "What will be the plan to 
follow, sir?" 
 
GrimLock began to speak but Mirage busted in. "Were just guarding the 
ark, thats all, no waking up olf friends, no touching, and no waking 
up decepticons just so you can beat them up." 
 
Grimlock's shoulders sagged as he grumbled... he walked over to the 
bot. "GrimLock tired of black sky, Make ship land!" 
 
Mirage held up a hand. "Whoah buddy we can't go down there like 
this,i mean come on i'm a race car and you..." 
 
"What wrong with GrimLock?!" The bot slammed his fist in the other 
bots computer and the ship lerched... "GrimLock broke box?" 
  
"Grimlock WHAT YOU HAVE " 
 
Grimlock looked at the computer. "Me fix!" He walked over pulling a 
puter out of the wall and slammed it into the old one. "See?" 
 
Mirage rapped an arm around the other bot. "Hold on!" 
 
The wall the computer had been in slowly began to buckle. "Grimlock 
turned and walked over. "Stupid Ship Broken." He grabed the wall hull 
and began pulling it together... 
 
Mirage held out a hand. "No GrimLock it'll...." 
 
THe hull breeched and the dino bot was sucked through tearing out a 
bigger hole. 
 
Mirage watched in horror. "GRIMLOCK!" 
 
Grimlock held onto the ship as it began to hit earth's atmosphere... 

Unkow bot
"HOLD ON!!!!!!"screamed the young bot while he tried not to be sucked 
by the hole.

GrimLock Lost his grip as the shuttle broke up, he curled up in a 
ball as his armor began to heat up quickly... Soon the craft and its 
lost passenger entered the atomosphere.... GrimLock held onto what he 
thought was a piece of the ship as he lay in some kind of field...
